target_glucose_zone()

summary: The heart rate zone definitions that make up the zone group. remarks: Each heart rate zone definition defines a zone for the zone group. In most cases the zone definitions should not overlap. returns: a HealthVault::WCData::Thing::Diabeticprofile::TargetGlucoseZone Array
